data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during MERSEY cruise from Portsmouth to Pouillac started at 1823-08-29
Ship: Mersey (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Portsmouth - Pouillac, 1st Observer: Edward Collier (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 28G 444BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
